content: these *four tiny snowflakes* are so very versatile they can be ornaments on your tree your windows your rear view mirrors as jewelry a pair of earrings a pendant a lapel pin glue them to a hair clip a candle a greeting card tie them to a gift a friendship bracelet a bookmark the possibilities are endless with size 10 crochet cotton they are under 2 inches each use size 20 or 30 to make them even tinier
